text: Hivlaura. That sounds like a wise choice to postpone. We can pick it up again later on.

Another mentor shared this animation apprenticeship. 
The deadline to apply is today... <https://www.blue-zoo.co.uk/feed/Animation-Assistant-TD-Apprenticeship/>

attachments.title: Animation Assistant TD - paid apprenticeship opportunity
attachments.text: We have a paid apprenticeship opportunity for an Animation Assistant TD - but hurry, applications close soon!
attachments.fallback: Animation Assistant TD - paid apprenticeship opportunity

text:
A project idea:  Photography Comosition and ways of seeing: You can use your phone to take photos. 
Take a photo everyday (or every other) of objects you see everyday maybe on your journeys to school , at home, in school, etc. 
Photograph them in a different way so they are almost not recognisable. So make them abstract, and out of context of what and how  you normally see them. 
Further challenge: use the same object for a week. Then the next week switch to another. Staying on the same object will force you to look at the object in different ways. 
Try for say 1 week, 2 weeks if you can. 
The more often you shoot, say daily, thenthe more often you can switch objects. 
Then I can add other photography challenges that are more thought provoking. 
I can give some famous art photographers list as a reference for ideas. 
Then post the images, daily if you want or weekly summary. 
What do you think?
Yeah I like the sound of that, I think I'll give it a go. I'll photograph the same object for a week
Thanks for the apprenticeship info but you need a degree to apply to it.:sweat_smile:
Cool try that challenge. If bored, I have other ideas. :wink:
I will get you a list of famous art photographers tomorrow when back at the school.
